fields.name: About Articles
fields.instructions: A list of Articles with information about the blog.

fields.name: AEG Logo
fields.instructions: The AEG Logo. This is used in the footer.

fields.name: AEG Logo Text
fields.instructions: Text on top of the AEG Logo

fields.name: Allow Comments
fields.instructions: Show/hide comment section on this page

fields.name: Article
fields.instructions: Embed another article or recipe.

fields.name: Articles per Page
fields.instructions: Define how many articles are shown per Page

fields.name: Caption
fields.instructions: A caption, i.e. for images or videos

fields.name: Category
fields.instructions: The category this page belongs to

fields.name: Category Pages
fields.instructions: Add links to category pages to the top navigation.

fields.name: Confirmation Copy
fields.instructions: Copytext for confirmation state of modal window

fields.name: Confirmation Headline
fields.instructions: Headline for confirmation state of modal window

fields.name: Content Format
fields.instructions: The content format this page belongs to

fields.name: Copyright Text
fields.instructions: Copyright text for the footer

fields.name: Diet
fields.instructions: Diet categories this recipe belongs to.

fields.name: Disclaimer Articles
fields.instructions: A list of articles like disclaimer and imprint

fields.name: Display Image
fields.instructions: Choose if the article-image is displayed as a title image

fields.name: Email Failure Message
fields.instructions: Text to display in case of a failure.

fields.name: Facebook Share Text
fields.instructions: Text for sharing via Facebook

new1.name: YouTube Link
new1.instructions: Please only use links like https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FcFxlK3kbdQ or https://www.youtube.com/embed/FcFxlK3kbdQ

fields.name: Ingredient Units
fields.instructions: A list of possible units for ingredients. Please make sure that the unit symbols are unique!

fields.name: Instructions
fields.instructions: Enter Instructions here. Each 'page' in the text will be rendered as one Step.

fields.name: Link Collection Articles
fields.instructions: Add a random amount of articles with captions (red text)

fields.name: Mail Share Text
fields.instructions: Button text for sharing via mail

fields.name: Main Ingredient
fields.instructions: Main ingredient for this article

fields.name: More Articles
fields.instructions: Tease more articles from this author

fields.name: Open Modal Button Text
fields.instructions: Text for the button which opens the modal window

fields.name: Print Text
fields.instructions: Text for print button

fields.name: Priority
fields.instructions: Priority attribute for articles and recipes

fields.name: Question Form Address
fields.instructions: The address where questions from the FAQ pages' form are sent to.

fields.name: Recipe
fields.instructions: Main content of a recipe

fields.name: Recipe Category
fields.instructions: Recipe category of this article

fields.name: Recipe Finder Button Text
fields.instructions: Text for the Recipe Finder button (which opens the recipe flyout).

fields.name: Recipe Results per Page
fields.instructions: Define how many Recipes are shown per Page on the Recipe Result Page.

fields.name: Related Teaser
fields.instructions: Add up to three related articles. Will be filled up by the system automatically.

fields.name: Related Teasers Category
fields.instructions: Choose a category from which the related teasers on this page should be picked

fields.name: Return Button Text
fields.instructions: Text for the return link in the modal window (to enter a new email address)

fields.name: Search Placeholder
fields.instructions: Placeholder text for the search bar.

fields.name: Search Results per Page
fields.instructions: Define how many Search Results are shown per Page on the Search Result Page.

fields.name: Sender Address
fields.instructions: Global Email Address to use as sender for mails.

fields.name: Short Introduction
fields.instructions: A short introduction to this page

fields.name: Show Full Width Teaser
fields.instructions: Define if a full width teaser is shown

fields.name: Show sticky teaser
fields.instructions: Define if a sticky teaser is shown on this page

fields.name: Thirds Teaser
fields.instructions: Add up to three articles for thirds teaser.

fields.name: Twitter Share Text
fields.instructions: Text for sharing via twitter

fields.name: YouTube Link
fields.instructions: Please only use links like https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FcFxlK3kbdQ or https://www.youtube.com/embed/FcFxlK3kbdQ

fields.name: Category Page Modules
fields.instructions: Add modules to the page

fields.name: Detail Page Modules
fields.instructions: Optional modules for the detail sites (articles & recipes)

fields.name: Homepage Modules
fields.instructions: Modules for the Homepage

fields.name: Outro
fields.instructions: Outro modules for Recipe and Article Pages

fields.name: Social Channels
fields.instructions: A list of links to social channels

fields.name: Top Navigation Teaser
fields.instructions: Add Content Format or Single Teasers to the top navigation.
